TopicTitle: What's the name of the mod that used to be 'No More Science Grind'?

Articles.Content: I'm looking for that one, however, I heard that it had a name change, but... I forget what it changed to....

Is it the one that sets all experiments to 100% on gathering (and possibly transmitting) science, so you only ever have to do it once?

If so, I believe you're looking for Full Reward.

I didn't know it changed its name, but it is really just a modulemanager config file. Create a file file [any name].cfg and place it either in the gamedata folder, or create a "no more science grinding" folder (or "spongebob squarepants" -- it doesn't matter) with the config file in it. The file containst this text:


  

//This will change the baseValue of Experiments to the scienceCap, so you don't have to grind infinitly

//One for ALL:
@EXPERIMENT_DEFINITION[*]
{
%baseValue = #$scienceCap$
}
